mal:composite.name: ArgumentValue
mal:composite.comment: The ArgumentValue structure holds an Argument value

mal:field.name: value
mal:field.comment: The argument value

mal:composite.name: ArgumentDefinition
mal:composite.comment: Argument definition specifies the type for an argument. Argument definition is used, for example, in TaskDefinition. The corresponding argument values are in a Task instance

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: The ID of argument definition

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The name of the argument definition

mal:field.name: description
mal:field.comment: The description of the argument definition

mal:field.name: type
mal:field.comment: The type of the argument definition

mal:field.name: childArguments
mal:field.comment: The list of definition childs

mal:composite.name: Trigger
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a trigger composite

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of the trigger

mal:field.name: timeTrigger
mal:field.comment: The synchronization time constraint

mal:field.name: eventTrigger
mal:field.comment: The synchronization event constraint

mal:composite.name: TimeTrigger
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a time trigger composite

mal:composite.name: EventTrigger
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a event trigger composite

mal:field.name: baseEvent
mal:field.comment: The Event to which the trigger is synchronized

mal:field.name: baseCount
mal:field.comment: Non negative number representing the event count of the event the time is based on

mal:composite.name: ExecutionTimingConstraints
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a execution timing constraints composite

mal:field.name: start
mal:field.comment: The scheduled start time or event

mal:field.name: end
mal:field.comment: The scheduled end time or event

mal:field.name: earliestStart
mal:field.comment: The earliest start time or event

mal:field.name: latestStart
mal:field.comment: The latest start time or event

mal:field.name: latestEnd
mal:field.comment: The latest end time or event

mal:composite.name: ExecutionRunningConstraints
mal:composite.comment: A collection of running constraints for a Task/Activity. Considered low priority

mal:composite.name: ExecutionPredecessor
mal:composite.comment: The Task, whose completion or failure is a pre-condition for some other Task

mal:field.name: taskKd
mal:field.comment: The task that is a predecessor

mal:composite.name: Event
mal:composite.comment: Events are used for synchronizing Task/Activity executions. Events have arguments. Event is associated with exactly one Event definition

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of the event

mal:field.name: eventDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: ID of the event definition

mal:field.name: source
mal:field.comment: The source of the Event

mal:field.name: argumentValues
mal:field.comment: The argument values. The arguments are in the order of argument definitions in the Event definition objects

mal:composite.name: EventDefinition
mal:composite.comment: The Event Definition defines a 'class' or a 'type' of Events. Each Event is associated with exactly one Task Definition

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of the Event definition

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The name of the Event definition

mal:field.name: description
mal:field.comment: The description of the Event definition

mal:field.name: arguments
mal:field.comment: The argument definition. The argument definitions specify the type of arguments
